attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: allow Tul Bahadur Pun to enter this country to live and receive any medical help that he may require, he has served this country and deserves to be treated as a u.k. citazen.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your email address.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
